languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт опускает глаза и изумленно смотрит на свой нагрудник, в котором тускло поблескивает расколовшийся камень душ.{/n} "Милостивая Иша..."
{n}Yrliet looks down at her breastplate in astonishment, seeing her shattered spirit stone.{/n} "O merciful Isha..."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт опускает глаза и изумленно смотрит на свой нагрудник, в котором тускло поблескивает расколовшийся камень душ.{/n} "Милостивая Иша..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet looks down at her breastplate, bewildered, where the shattered spirit stone is.{/n} "O merciful Isha..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特低头看了一眼胸甲，惊讶地发现灵魂石已经碎了。{/n}“噢，爱莎在上……”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks down at her breastplate in astonishment, seeing her shattered spirit stone.{/n} "O merciful Isha..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特低头看了一眼胸甲，惊讶地发现灵魂石已经碎了。{/n}“噢，爱莎在上……”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet baja la mirada a su coraza y contempla anonadada la joya espiritual resquebrajada.{/n} «Oh, por la misericordia de Isha...».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks down at her breastplate in astonishment, seeing her shattered spirit stone.{/n} "O merciful Isha..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet baja la mirada a su coraza y contempla anonadada la joya espiritual resquebrajada.{/n} «Oh, por la misericordia de Isha...».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet baisse les yeux sur son plastron et découvre avec sidération que sa pierre-esprit s'est brisée.{/n} « Ô, miséricordieuse Isha... »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks down at her breastplate in astonishment, seeing her shattered spirit stone.{/n} "O merciful Isha..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet baisse les yeux sur son plastron et découvre avec sidération que sa pierre-esprit s'est brisée.{/n} « Ô, miséricordieuse Isha... »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet blickt erstaunt hinab auf ihre Brustplatte und sieht ihren zerstörten Seelenstein.{/n} "O gnädige Isha ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks down at her breastplate in astonishment, seeing her shattered spirit stone.{/n} "O merciful Isha..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet blickt erstaunt hinab auf ihre Brustplatte und sieht ihren zerstörten Seelenstein.{/n} "O gnädige Isha ..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}砕け散った魂縛石を見て、ユリエットは驚いて胸当てに目を落とす。{/n}「ああ、慈悲深きイシャよ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks down at her breastplate in astonishment, seeing her shattered spirit stone.{/n} "O merciful Isha..."

traits.locale_text: {n}砕け散った魂縛石を見て、ユリエットは驚いて胸当てに目を落とす。{/n}「ああ、慈悲深きイシャよ…」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, şaşkınlıkla göğüs plakasına bakarak parçalanmış ruh taşını görüyor.{/n} "Merhametli İşa aşkına..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks down at her breastplate in astonishment, seeing her shattered spirit stone.{/n} "O merciful Isha..."
